StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetFacili.es]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID int, @Organiza.onType varchar(3) = NULL AS
SELECT RO.ORGANIZATION_ID, RO.NAME, RO.ISOPEN FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION RO INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP OM ON (RO.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID AND CASE @Organiza.onType WHEN 'OSS' THEN RO.ORGANIZATION_ID ELSE OM.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID END = @Organiza.onID) ORDER BY RO.ISOPEN DESC, RO.NAME
